mapper.select: SELECT t.id, a.name author, t. name, b. name category, t.intro, t.docText, ifnull(t.reading,0) reading, DATE_FORMAT(t.dateOfPublication, '%Y-%m-%d') dateOfPublication FROM writing t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, NAME FROM portal.dict WHERE category_id = '84' ) b ON t.category = b. CODE left join writer a on t.author=a.id WHERE t.id=#{condition.id}
mapper.update: update writing set reading=reading+1 where id=#{condition.id}
